channel.title: Need help with run error, [PI], Rep ++
channel.description: I Get this error because my server can't load .xml files, I fixed 2 .xml files and I have 2 more that I can't seem to fix. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstr eam/XStream at server.util.XStreamLibrary.<clinit>(XStreamLibrary.java:25) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:86) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:154) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:423) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:356) ... 3 more Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Need help with run error, [PI], Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:3, topic:432907”][quote author=leonscape link=topic=535614.msg3915944#msg3915944 date=1329178507]
Change the run bat to this @echo off color 0a title leonscape.no-ip.info "C:/program files/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
[/quote]
Can’t bro I have specific paths my server needs to run to actually open up the run.bat to run it self.[/quote]For the string, try /FileName.XML

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with run error, [PI], Rep ++

item.title: Need help with run error, [PI], Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

I Get this error because my server can’t load .xml files, I fixed 2 .xml files and I have 2 more that I can’t seem to fix.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstr
eam/XStream
        at server.util.XStreamLibrary.<clinit>(XStreamLibrary.java:25)
        at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:86)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:154)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:423)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:356)
        ... 3 more
Press any key to continue . . .
